derivation: or מָגֻר; from H1481 (גּוּר) in the sense of lodging;
outline:
1. sojourning place, dwelling-place, sojourning
    1. dwelling-place
    2. sojourning, lifetime
kjv_def: dwelling, pilgrimage, where sojourn, be a stranger. Compare H4032 (מָגוֹר).
strongs_def: a temporary abode; by extension, a permanent residence
